mapper.select: SELECT HR.HSRP_NO, HR.HSRP_DT, HR.HSRP_REASON, HR.PA_NO, HR.EMP_NO, HR.HSRP_TYPE, HR.HSRP_STATE, P.PA_NAME, P.PA_REG, C.CLINIC_STATE FROM HOSPITAL_RECEPTION HR JOIN PATIENT P ON HR.PA_NO = P.PA_NO LEFT JOIN CLINIC_CHART C ON HR.HSRP_NO = C.HSRP_NO WHERE HR.EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND (C.CLINIC_STATE IS NULL OR (C.CLINIC_STATE != 'CRST04' AND C.CLINIC_STATE != 'CRST06' AND C.CLINIC_STATE != 'CRST07' AND C.CLINIC_STATE != 'CRST08')) ORDER BY CASE WHEN HR.HSRP_TYPE = 'RCTY02' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, HR.HSRP_NO ASC

SELECT HR.HSRP_NO, HR.HSRP_DT, HR.HSRP_REASON, HR.PA_NO, HR.EMP_NO, HR.HSRP_TYPE, HR.HSRP_STATE, P.PA_NAME, P.PA_REG, C.CLINIC_STATE FROM HOSPITAL_RECEPTION HR JOIN PATIENT P ON HR.PA_NO = P.PA_NO LEFT JOIN CLINIC_CHART C ON HR.HSRP_NO = C.HSRP_NO WHERE TRUNC(HR.HSRP_DT) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) ORDER BY CASE WHEN HR.HSRP_TYPE = 'RCTY02' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, HR.HSRP_NO ASC

SELECT HR.HSRP_NO, HR.HSRP_DT, HR.HSRP_REASON, HR.PA_NO, HR.EMP_NO, HR.HSRP_TYPE, HR.HSRP_STATE, P.PA_NAME, P.PA_REG, C.CLINIC_STATE FROM HOSPITAL_RECEPTION HR JOIN PATIENT P ON HR.PA_NO = P.PA_NO LEFT JOIN CLINIC_CHART C ON HR.HSRP_NO = C.HSRP_NO ORDER BY CASE WHEN HR.HSRP_TYPE = 'RCTY02' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, HR.HSRP_NO ASC

mapper.select: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN visit_count > 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS multi_visit_patients, SUM(CASE WHEN visit_count = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS single_visit_patients FROM ( SELECT PA_NO, COUNT(*) AS visit_count FROM HOSPITAL_RECEPTION GROUP BY PA_NO ) subquery
